title: Order Flow Rhythm
content:
The indicator visualizes the speed of deal flow in the form of a heat map.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Settings

NameDescription
Mode Calculation Mode of the Indicator

Options:
  • Volume
  • Bid & Ask
Period Specifies the quantity of recent candles to include in the calculations.
Custom session If enabled, allows the use of a custom session, otherwise the default session.
Session Begin Defines the start date of data recording.
The indicator loads volume data not more than 5 days.
Session end Defines the end date of data recording.

Heatmap settings

NameDescription
Color scheme Works if 'Custom color scheme' is disabled

Options:
  • DarkToOrange
  • DarkToRed
  • LightToRed
  • Grayscale
  • VioletToYellow
  • VioletToYellow2
  • RedToLightToGreen
  • OrangeToDarkToGreen
  • RedToDarkToGreen
  • DarkToVioletToRed
  • DarkToBlue
  • DarkToBlueToGreen
  • DarkToGreen
  • DarkToRedToLight
  • LightToPink
  • LightToBlue
  • LightToDarkToGreen
  • LightToGreen
  • LightToPinkToRed
  • PinkRedGraBlue
Upper cut-off, % The parameter sets the upper limit for the maximum volume, determining the colors used to represent it. For example, if a 5% cutoff is selected, the platform will assign the maximum color to the top 5% of volumes.
Contrast Determines the contrast ratio for a given element.
Use transparency Determines whether to use transparency for elements with small values.
Custom proportion Defines the maximum volume size for determining the proportionality factor.

Misc

NameDescription
Show description The parameter controls the visibility of the indicator's name and its parameters on the chart, enabling the display of this information to be toggled on or off.

Drawing

NameDescription
Panel Determines the display location of the indicator: it can either integrate within the main chart area or appear on a separate panel below the chart.
